Error Resolution Steps.Description: Press Win + S → type regedit. Right-click Registry Editor → select 'Run as administrator'. Running as admin is required to access HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE.

In Registry Editor, expand the keys in this order: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE → SYSTEM → CurrentControlSet → Control → FileSystem. Click each folder (triangle/arrow) to expand. Don’t type manually in the search box.

Look for LongPathsEnabled in the right pane. If it exists, double-click it → set Value = 1 → OK. If it does not exist, right-click → New → DWORD (32-bit) Value, Name it 'LongPathsEnabled', double-click it → set Value = 1 → OK.
Changes only take effect after a restart.
